Summary: Powerful flash turned all sky bright blue for a flash second.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was laying in my bed in the dark with my curtains open but as I got up and gazed out the window, i saw the whole sky flash a bright blue. It was only there for a second or so. But it was similar to the way that meteor made the sky turn bright in the Canada incident. I know that on a different occasion I saw some electric blue object bolt for a cloud before, and it was so high up in the sky, yet it's light was so potent that I noticed it from thousands of miles below. I don't know that this could have been the same object but whatever was so strong that it made the whole sky turn very bright in a flash. I don't know what it was.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Huntington Park
There were no other sightings in Huntington Park on or around December 21st 2008
